mapper.select: select a.id as board_id, a.title as board_title, a.bg_color as board_bg_color, b.id as list_id, b.board_id as list_board_id, b.title as list_title, b.pos as list_pos, c.id as card_id, c.list_id as card_list_id, c.title as card_title, c.pos as card_pos, c.description as card_description, c.label_color as card_label_color, c.location as card_location from Board a left outer join list b on a.id = b.board_id left outer join card c on b.id = c.list_id where a.id = #{boardId}
